amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children by $604 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants, and Children by $604 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 64 - 360 (Roll no. 430).
